page.title: 04THE CHEMICAL WORKS TODAY
page.content:
Today, British Chrome and Chemicals is one of the World's major manufacturers of a range of{chromium {chemicals}and is the only such plant in the UK.These chemicals are used in various industries eg construction, plastics and rust proofing both at home and overseas.
The plant is in a very unusual and {isolated}situation away from the major industrial areas of Teesside. The local{railway line}was one of the main reasons for remaining in this location but since British Rail changed its type of wagons,{road transport}has become cheaper. The local road network has been very much improved over recent years, with the new A66 dual carriageway which links to the major North-South motorway, the A1(M).
